data.body:
apparently hitting shift-v wipes out the entire list of "stage:verification" beats, which then gets refreshed about 10 seconds later.  that is obviously wrong.

what should happen is when you click shift-v, you should get some kind of UX/UI clue that you have initiated a verification, some kind of transition maybe, until the confirmation of the change has been received.
